How can AlphaFold-Multimer be applied to: By predicting the binding conformations of nanobodies to the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein.
By designing small molecule inhibitors for the SARS-CoV-2 main protease.
By simulating the entire viral replication cycle.
By identifying mutations in the SARS-CoV-2 genome.
How was the accuracy of AlphaFold-Multim: By comparing them with experimental data from X-ray crystallography, showing an RMSD of 1.2 Å.
By conducting in vivo experiments in a mouse model.
Through comparison with NMR spectroscopy data.
By using mass spectrometry to confirm protein interactions.
What is the primary role of the FAM86 do: It confers substrate specificity to promote EEF2-Lys525 methylation.
It inhibits the methylation of EEF2-Lys525.
It acts as a scaffold for EEF2-Lys525 phosphorylation.
It degrades EEF2 to prevent its methylation.
What potential therapeutic application d: Designing specific inhibitors targeting the FAM86 domain to disrupt the FAM86A-EEF2 interaction.
Developing vaccines that enhance EEF2 methylation.
Creating gene therapies to overexpress FAM86A.
Engineering EEF2 variants with increased methylation resistance.
